1011111101101101 0111101010100110 0 -> sum: 0011101000010011, cout: 1
1011010010010010 1011011010000001 1 -> sum: 0110101100010100, cout: 1
1101110001111000 1000110110011001 1 -> sum: 0110101000010010, cout: 1
1001001011100010 0001000011000101 1 -> sum: 1010001110101000, cout: 0
0110011010110001 0010001001100010 0 -> sum: 1000100100010011, cout: 0
1010000010001000 1100100100111011 0 -> sum: 0110100111000011, cout: 1
